attributes.action: standardise recyling of household waste throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make all Councils in the UK conform to the same recycling waste programme and not as at present where different Councils and Boroughs accept different levels of waste ie some will not accept kitchen waste whilst others do, some will not accept all plastic whilst others do, this makes a farce of the governments plans to reduce global warming world wide when it appears that the UK is only half heartedly recycling rubbish
